entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:25 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:35 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 6:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 7.1°C
Pressure: 98.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 7.0°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to a few showers this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
